aesthetics: Amazonense (neon flora, dark tribal motifs, futuristic greenery)
High contrast (neon greens, magentas, dark grays/blacks)

key_features.name: Immersive Background
key_features.description: Interactive WebGL liquid/fluid simulation that reacts to mouse movement.

key_features.name: 3D Interactive Element
key_features.description: Central 3D rotating object (e.g., logo or cyberpunk artifact) synchronized with scroll/mouse.

key_features.name: Shotgun-style Event Ticketing
key_features.description: Fast, high-conversion, clean UI for listing upcoming electronic music events and buying tickets.

key_features.name: Organization Roster
key_features.description: Boilerplate section displaying 11 organization members with dynamic, slightly glitchy hover effects.
